title: New: PHOSPHOR – Blossom / Cold Hearted
body: I don’t mean to stereotype, but **PHOSPHOR** could only be from London. The appearance, the slightly pretentious name, and the new-age sound all point towards hailing from the capital city. That said, who cares where a group come from when they make music as good as these two new tracks from the electro-wave duo. Heavily shoegaze influenced, _Blossom_ is a sleazy **My Bloody Valentine**\-esque number; relentless and unforgiving in sound, but utterly fantastic. On the flip-side _Cold Hearted_ is another brooding, mysterious effort; walls of guitars block out any glimmer of optimistic light whilst the female vocals are elegant and vivaciously dominating. Check out _Blossom_ and _Cold Hearted_ below. Cold Hearted EP by PHOSPHOR
